sentences.sContent: While the cerebrum is unnecessary for basic survival responses, we still use far more than 10 percent of our brains.
sentences.sContent_eng: While the cerebrum is unnecessary for basic survival responses, we still use far more than 10 percent of our brains.
sentences.sCn: 即使大脑对基础生存反应来说是不必要的，我们仍然需要使用多于百分之10的大脑。

sentences.sContent: The cerebrum contains the information that essentially makes us who we are: our intelligence, memory, personality, emotion, speech, and ability to feel and move.
sentences.sContent_eng: The cerebrum contains the information that essentially makes us who we are: our intelligence, memory, personality, emotion, speech, and ability to feel and move.
sentences.sCn: 大脑中包含的信息基本勾勒出了我们是怎样的人：我们的智力、记忆、个性、情感、言语、以及感觉和运动能力。

sentences.sContent: The nervous system and cerebrum require nutrition.
sentences.sContent_eng: The nervous system and cerebrum require nutrition.
sentences.sCn: 神经系统和大脑需要营养物质。

trans.tranOther: the anterior portion of the brain of vertebrates, consisting of two lateral hemispheres joined by a thick band of fibres: the dominant part of the brain in man, associated with intellectual function, emotion, and personality
